Keystate: 7 - Annotation: ['Move the towel to the right of the table', 'Slide the towel to the right of the table', 'Relocate the towel from the bottom right of the table to the right of the table', 'Move the towel to the right and backward on the table']
Keystate: 11 - Annotation: ['Move the pot to the left of the fruit', 'Rotate the pot 180 degrees', 'Place the apple next to the pot', 'Remove the banana from the table']
Keystate: 21 - Annotation: ['Slide the yellow cloth to the right', 'Move the yellow cloth forward and to the right', 'Reposition the yellow cloth to the bottom right of the table', 'Place the yellow cloth next to the white plastic basket on the bottom right of the table.']
Keystate: 26 - Annotation: ['Rotate the pot 180 degrees', 'Lift the pot and place it 10 cm to the right', 'Slide the pot forward until it touches the edge of the table', 'Move the pot to the center of the table']
Keystate: 39 - Annotation: ['Retrieve the towel from the washing machine and place it on the table next to the yellow cloth and white plastic basket', 'Take the towel out of the washing machine and move it to a new location on the table', 'Transfer the towel from one location on the table to another', 'Move the towel to the right of the yellow cloth.']
Keystate: 43 - Annotation: ['Take the yellow cloth out of the basket and place it next to the towel', 'Move the yellow cloth from the white plastic basket to the right side of the towel', 'Transfer the yellow cloth from inside the basket to a new location next to the towel', 'Lift the yellow cloth out of the basket and place it to the right of the towel']
Keystate: 50 - Annotation: ['Move the white plastic basket to the right and place it on top of the yellow cloth', 'Transfer the white plastic basket from the left side of the table to the right side, placing it on top of the yellow cloth', 'Relocate the white plastic basket from the bottom of the table to the bottom right, placing it on top of the yellow cloth', 'Move the white plastic basket to the right and place it next to the towel.']
Keystate: 65 - Annotation: ['Slide the yellow cloth to the left of the white plastic basket', 'Move the yellow cloth to the left and place it next to the white plastic basket', 'Relocate the yellow cloth from the right of the towel to the left of the white plastic basket', 'Move the yellow cloth 135 pixels to the left and 62 pixels backward.']
Keystate: 76 - Annotation: ['Move the towel to the right of the yellow cloth and next to the white plastic basket', 'Slide the towel to the bottom right corner of the table', 'Pick up the towel from the bottom of the table and place it next to the white plastic basket', 'Place the towel next to the white plastic basket.']
Keystate: 87 - Annotation: ['Move the white plastic basket to the left of the towel', 'Move the white plastic basket behind the towel', 'Move the white plastic basket from the bottom right of the table to the bottom of the table', 'Move the white plastic basket 276 pixels to the left and 71 pixels backward.']
Keystate: 109 - Annotation: ['Move the white plastic basket to the right of the yellow cloth', 'Place the white plastic basket next to the yellow cloth on the bottom right of the table', 'Relocate the white plastic basket from the bottom of the table to the bottom right, positioning it next to the yellow cloth', 'Move the white plastic basket 248 pixels to the right and 58 pixels forward, placing it next to the yellow cloth.']
Keystate: 128 - Annotation: ['Place the yellow cloth inside the white plastic basket', 'Grasp the yellow cloth and transfer it to the white plastic basket', 'Fold the yellow cloth and place it inside the white plastic basket', 'Move the yellow cloth from the bottom right of the table to the bottom left of the table and place it inside the white plastic basket']
Keystate: 140 - Annotation: ['Move the yellow cloth to the left of the towel and inside the white plastic basket', 'Place the yellow cloth next to the towel on its left side and inside the white plastic basket', 'Relocate the yellow cloth from the right of the white plastic basket to the left of the towel and inside the basket']
Keystate: 154 - Annotation: ['Pick up the towel', 'Move the towel 72 pixels to the right', 'Remove the towel from the white plastic basket', 'Place the towel next to the gripper.']
